column3: Mandy : Let me _____myself. My name is Mandy Lawson. Andy : Hi... I am Andy. Nice to meet you! Mandy : Nice to meet you too.
I told you yesterday that I ___ the cinema with my family tomorrow, so I can’t go with you.
Wendy : What do you think of my singing? Joy : It sounds great, but I suggest you try singing in a high tune. Wendy : Okay, thanks Joy. Joy : No problem Wendy. From the dialogue above, Wendy is___

Jeni : Dita, why do you look so sad? Dita : I got bad scores on my last test. What should I do, Jen? Jeni : Why don’t you watch a live class from Youtube to learn better? Dita : That’s a good idea. I’ll try to do that. Thanks, Jeni. Jeni : Anytime, Dita. According to the conversation above, which expression shows giving suggestion?
Dita, why you look so sad?
Why don’t you watch a live class from Youtube to learn better?
Gilda : I think the car is too small for us. Remember we are four. Peter : I’m with you. We need a ____one. Gilda : So, which car are we going to buy, then?

Sarah : Mathematics is the most difficult subject. No wonder a lot of students fail
the test. John : That’s absolutely right. If we know the right way to study, we
won’t find it too difficult.
Sarah : You’re right. I think we still have to find the ____way to study.
Dany and Dana must wear glasses their gadgets.
Makaila has not … her homework yet.
If you my book, please return it after reading it

One of my friend lives in Pangndaran. There is Pangandaran Beach there. It is located in West Java . Pangandaran beach has beautiful scenery. This beach has white sand. In Pangandaran Beach, we can see beautiful waves, boats, assorted shellfish, and fish. Pangandaran Beach is very famous in Indonesia. This beach is the most visited while on vacation. The purpose of the text is______.

Siti has just got the first prize in the “Bakiak Race” to celebrate Indonesia Independence day. Beni congratulates her. What does Beni say to congratulate Siti? Beni : _________________ Siti : Thank you.
Tom : Wow ... That house is very big. Sam : And lovely, isn’t it ? Tom : Right, I hope someday I have one like that. Sam : _________________ The right sentence to complete the dialogue is___
Buy the house if you want.
If you want to have one, you should save your money.
If you will have money, buy it.
Waiter : Under what name would you like the reservation? Hasan : Siregar. Hasan Siregar. Waiter : ________________ Hasan : Yes, it is 085212345617.
May I have your phone number?
Can I tell you my phone number?
Should you write your phone number?
Will you speak about your phone number?
Ihsan : ______________ Pedestrian: The nearest post office is about one kilometer from here. Head to the north. It's next to a workshop. Ihsan : Okay, thank you.
Excuse me, do you know where the bus station is?
Hello sir, are you going to a post office?
Excuse me, how far is the post office from here?
Keep driving until the intersection, the post office is on the corner.
Deri : Would you like dinner with me tonight ? Rina : Thank you. I’d love to. From the dialogue above we conclude that ....
Deri invites Rina to have dinner together.

Soal No. 16
Shinta : I heard you won the first prize for your short story. _______(16) Wulan : _________ (17). Shinta : As your friend, I’m ________(18). Wulan : Thank you. Shinta : You deserve it because it’s a very good story. Wulan : Thank you.

Soal No. 17
Shinta : I heard you won the first prize for your short story. _______(16) Wulan : _________ (17). Shinta : As your friend, I’m ________(18). Wulan : Thank you. Shinta : You deserve it because it’s a very good story. Wulan : Thank you.

Soal No. 18
Shinta : I heard you won the first prize for your short story. _______(16) Wulan : _________ (17). Shinta : As your friend, I’m ________(18). Wulan : Thank you. Shinta : You deserve it because it’s a very good story. Wulan : Thank you.
Kiki : Using smart phone gives a lot of benefits. I don’t think I could live without it. Susi : ______ It also has some bad impacts. That’s why we must be wise.
Kanaya : It’s very hot here. ________ Nadira : Sure. No problem. The suitable expression to complete the dialogue is …
Would you mind if I turn off the fan?
Would you turn off the fan?
Would you mind if I turn on the fan?

Soal No. 21
This text is for questions 21 to 24. Long, long ago, when ______ (21) gods and goddesses used to mingle in the affairs of mortals, there was a small kingdom on the slope of Mount Wayang in West Java. The King, named Sang Prabu, was a wise man. He had an only daughter, called Princess Teja Nirmala, who was ________(22) for her beauty but she was not married. One day Sang Prabu made up his mind to settle the matter by a show of strength. After that, Prince of Blambangan, named Raden Begawan had won the competition. ________(23), the wicked fairy, Princess Segara fell in love with Raden Begawan and used magic power to render him unconscious and he forgot his wedding. When Sang Prabu was searching, Raden Begawan saw him and soon realized that he had been enchanted by the wicked fairy. The fairy could not accept this, so she ________(24) Raden Begawan. When Princess Teja Nirmala heard this, she was very sad. So a nice fairy took her to the Kahyangan

Soal No. 25 
In accordance with the international security regulations, the following items are never ____ (25) to be taken onto a plane by passengers, either in their carry-on bags ____ (26) in their checked luggage: weapons, including knives and guns; explosive, including dynamit and fireworks. The following items may be placed _____(27) checked luggage but not to carry-on bags. Tools, including including hammers, screwdrivers, and wrenches; sport equipment such as golf clubs, bas ballbats, skis and ski poles. When you pass the security line, all bags will go through our X ray machines and some bags will be manually checked by personnel, as well. Thank you for your ____ (28). Have a safe and pleasant flight.

To apply for a certain position
To provide inputs for the company
To give information about his specialty
To tell the readers about his experience

Call the recipient for the confirmation
Wait for the response of the company

Soal No. 32
Which of the following activities done by hackers is considered illegal?
Finding the strenght and weaknesses of a computer system
Helping the police catch the white collar criminals
Breaking into vital institutions network system
Helping to improve the safety system of computer

Soal No. 33
We can infer from the text that hackers .....
Always help the police to againts criminals
Can turn to be criminals due to the money orientation

Soal No. 34
..., and the worst thing is they can get secret information,… The antonym of the word “worst” is…

Soal No. 35
What is the purpose of the invitation letter above?
To tell Daniel Mahardika about the Lentera Warna’s anniversary
To invite Daniel Mahardika to attend the fifth anniversary event of Lentera Warna.
To persuade Daniel Mahardika to join the Lentera Warna’s business
To announce the anniversary of PT. Lentera Warna and PT. Karya Gemilang.

Soal No. 36
From the text above, we can infer that . . .
PT. Karya Gemilang is the opposite of PT. Lentera Warna.
PT. Lentera Warna has supported PT. Karya Gemilang since 2018.
PT. Karya Gemilang and PT. Lentera Warna have been business partners for five years.
PT. Karya Gemilang and PT. Lentera Warna are celebrating their companion

Respond whether you can come or not.
Send an email when you accept the invitation.

How to record with a camera

What time is it to do the activity together outside the building?

Lani’s shoes are the most expensive.
Doni’s shoes are cheaper than Ali’s shoes
Ghea’s shoes are more expensive than Ali’s
Ali’s shoes is cheaper than Doni’s.
